The researcher of the Quranic, his groan, say that if I know what I know is what you are promised or make my Lord make a response to what the participants said when they are heard, and they said that they are.Dakar and a mockery, when will that the barrier be, but it was narrated from a fighter that al -Nadhar ibn al -Harith said that, then it was said that it is a being, not the one who is a matter of what is, and it is not.By asking them, and this answer is the will of what is on the day of resurrection, which has the most severe and hidden denial, and his time from the caliphs is the absence of hidden and intended with the enemy of the long time With the relative, otherwise it is a comprehensive place for them, and therefore it was described far away in his saying, the exalted, if it is between it and between it and between it, after the one who is the one who said: The end of the end, as if it was said, I do not know, it is a signed situation in every hour, or is it a deferred that was struck by an end, the first and the first and closest.
